title: Claimant job title
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these details. You will not be penalised for not providing them.

isClaimantJobTitleCorrect.label: Is the claimant’s job title correct?

whatIsClaimantJobTitle.label: What is or was the claimant’s correct job title? (optional)

whatIsClaimantJobTitle.tooLong: The job title entered must be less than 100 characters
